sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CODE_ID , A.CODE , A.CODE_NM , A.CODE_DC FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD A, OE1TNOECOMMCD B WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND B.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID AND A.CODE_ID = #codeId# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR ASC

SELECT CD.CODE_ID , CD.CODE , CD.CODE_NM , CD.CODE_DC FROM ( SELECT A.CODE_ID , A.CODE , A.CODE_NM , A.CODE_DC , 'Y' USE_AT , A.SORT_ORDR FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD A, OE1TNOECOMMCD B WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND B.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID AND A.CODE_ID = #codeId# UNION ALL SELECT A.CODE_ID , A.CODE , CONCAT(A.CODE_NM,'(-)') , A.CODE_DC , 'N' USE_AT , A.SORT_ORDR FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD A, OE1TNOECOMMCD B WHERE A.USE_AT = 'N' AND B.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID AND A.CODE_ID = #codeId# ) CD ORDER BY CD.USE_AT DESC, CD.SORT_ORDR ASC

SELECT #tableNm# CODE_ID, ORGNZT_ID CODE, ORGNZT_NM CODE_NM, ORGNZT_DC CODE_DC FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO WHERE 1=1
ORGNZT_ID LIKE #detailConditionValue#

GROUP_ID LIKE #detailConditionValue#
